articles.description: Spanish researchers followed 148 family members of people who had decided to strictly follow the Mediterranean diet. Relatives lost an average of 4kg (8.8lbs) after 24 months.
articles.content:
If one family member is on a diet, the people they live with will also lose weight, a study has found.

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Apple event rumoured for 23 March - here's what we're expecting to be released - Sky News
articles.description: A new feature which has provoked a furious response from Facebook could allow iPhone users to opt-out of being tracked.
